---
title: "Intermediate R course"
---

This is the first part of a follow on course for the (NHS-R Community's Introduction to R and R Studio course)[https://intro-r-rstudio.nhsrcommunity.com/] or for people who have some familiarity and comfort in using R. 

If you're keen to continue your learning before the next part is published, you can see the YouTube recording of the live intermediate course at https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-ryFXMK1DoI&t=4535s

Your feedback on how you find using the course is very welcome at https://forms.office.com/e/LH8RRn5xyC
